snippet.title: Mega-CD Longplay [093] Brutal - Paws of Fury
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by Valis77

This fixes many problems from the snes and genesis such as not being knocked down when you are BLOCKING a strong attack and the music here is brilliant. The difficulty learning curve is still a issue, but it's slightly more balanced then the previous versions. This is by far one of the best of 4 versions of this game. I have to say the FMV animated cutescenes is a nice addition but it could have used more with diffrent characters. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
